Meta.title: Techno Groop – Professional Electrical Services
Meta.description: Comprehensive electrical solutions, low-current installations, automation, and photovoltaics for businesses and general contractors in Poland and Belgium.

Hero.title: Professional electrical services for your business
Hero.subtitle: Comprehensive electrical, low-current, and automation solutions for general contractors in Poland and Belgium. 22+ specialists, VCA certified, fully insured.

Services.subtitle: Comprehensive electrical and installation solutions for business

residential.title: Residential Electrical
residential.description: Full range of electrical work in residential buildings: installations, panels, lighting, outlets.

industrial.title: Industrial Electrical
industrial.description: Electrical installations for production halls, warehouses, and commercial facilities.

lowCurrent.title: Low-Current Systems
lowCurrent.description: LAN networks, CCTV, access control, alarm systems, and intercom.

automation.title: Building Automation
automation.description: BMS systems, KNX, smart lighting and HVAC control.

plumbing.title: Plumbing & HVAC
plumbing.description: Water supply, sewage, heating, ventilation systems.

solar.title: Photovoltaics
solar.description: Installation and connection of solar panel systems for business.

About.title: About Techno Groop
About.subtitle: Professionalism and experience in electrical installations
About.description: Techno Groop Sp. z o.o. is a dynamically growing company specializing in comprehensive electrical and installation services. We have been operating since 2023, serving general contractors in Poland and Belgium.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We deliver reliable electrical solutions that help our clients complete projects on time and within budget.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A team of 22 qualified specialists with VCA certificates and height work qualifications. We plan to grow to 50+ employees.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityDesc: We execute every project according to the highest standards.
values.safetyDesc: Health and safety is our priority — VCA certificates, full insurance.

Reviews.title: Client Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: What general contractors say about us

review1.text: Professional team, timely delivery, great communication. We recommend Techno Groop for electrical projects.
review1.author: Jan Kowalski

review2.text: We have been working with Techno Groop for a year. Flexibility and work quality are at the highest level.
review2.author: Pierre Dubois

review3.text: Quick response, competitive prices, reliable crew. We will definitely continue our cooperation.
review3.author: Anna Nowak
